Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin and Madison: due to, a festival near Madison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin and Madison: due to, a festival near Madison/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
